name: Pizza Ninja Story
description:
Slice the tomatoes
Cut the cheese
Chop the onions
Throw the olives
Can you smell the heavenly good scent of Pizza?
Get ready for action as a young ninja shinobi and become the best Pizzaiolo!
DISCOVER PIZZA AROUND THE WORLD
Set out on the journey from Italy where everything begun, through the kitchens of New York, Cairo, Moscow and more...
ESTABLISH YOUR OWN KITCHEN
Cut and slash the ingredients like a real ninja to collect precious recipes for your kitchen.
UPGRADE YOUR KATANA
Unlock and upgrade special abilities for your katana during your quest.
EXPLORE OVER 90 LEVELS
Becoming a Ninja is a long road full of fun and adventure. Don't betray the legacy of your kitchen shifu! Follow in his steps to achieve the zen state of mind and become a grand pizza chef.
FEATURES
Make your path through the world of pizza in all levels
Learn to overcome various obstacles
Master different tasks in each type of level
Upgrade your katana
Collect all recipes
Unlock game achievements
Compete with your friends or help them progress further

PLEASE NOTE! Pizza Ninja Story is free to download and play. However some game items can be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
